document.text:
From: "Boyd, Stephen E. (OLA)" 
To: 
'• 
(USANYS)" 
Cc: 
"-(USANYS)" 
Subject: 
RE: MCC Indictment 
Date: Tue, 19 Nov 
2019 16:36:12 +0000 
Thank you — much appreciated.
From: (USANYS)
Sent: Tuesday, November 19, 2019 11:36 AM 
To: Boyd, Stephen E. (OLA) < 
Cc: Strauss, Audrey (USANYS) 
Subject: MCC Indictment 
Stephen —Attached please find a copy of the Indictment obtained this morning charging two correctional officers at MCC 
in connection with their failures to perform their duties on the night of the suicide of Jeffrey Epstein. The attached has 
also now been filed with the court and is thus a public document. Please let us know if we can pass on anything else that 
might be of use. 
Co-Chief, Public Corruption Unit 
U.S. Attorney's Office for the 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00017939
